original_title: Govt. to make taxation system more efficient
original_body_lines: The government has drawn attention to making the taxation system more efficient.
Speaking to the media in the Avissawella area, State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya stated that a report pertaining to the matter is currently being prepared.
The government has decided to take that measure as a result of the deficiencies in the taxation methods.
